thread.title: Watch: Huge fire breaks out in Abu Dhabi tower
thread.title_full: Watch: Huge fire breaks out in Abu Dhabi tower

title: Watch: Huge fire breaks out in Abu Dhabi tower
text: (Picture via Twitter/@meerz) More details awaited about the incident Huge fire has broke out in Abu Dhabi late this evening. According to the reports, the fire has engulfed a building on Airport road in Abu Dhabi. The fire started from a restaurant at the ground floor of the building. From Delma street junction to Al Wahda mall junction, the Airport road is blocked. Rescue operations are underway. Abu Dhabi Police & Fire Brigade does an amazing job clearing street ensuring ppls safety while addressing the ??! hope everyone is safe! pic.twitter.com/bcBFKY1ekV
